description: This file defines an interface named IRtspClient within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. The interface specifies methods for configuring and controlling RTSP client operations, such as setup, play, teardown, and parameter management.

classes.name: IRtspClient
classes.description: An interface providing RTSP client functionalities, including configuration, setup, play, teardown, and parameter setting/getting.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures the RTSP client with the given service shell.

methods.name: Setup
methods.description: Prepares the RTSP session with specified asset ID and position.

methods.name: Play
methods.description: Starts playback at the specified scale and position.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets a parameter with the specified name and value.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a parameter by name.

ctags.name: IRtspClient
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IRtspClient : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
